zutil module¶

@Author : Shiyuan @Contact : shira0905@gmail.com @Time : 2021/9/2 20:38 @Desc :

zutil.cmd(logger, command, simulation=0)¶

wrap subprocess

Parameters

  • logger – if no None then print stdout

  • command – the command line to execute

  • simulation – log but not execute if 1; log and execute default 0

Returns

Return type

None

zutil.get_log(did, method, version)¶

Custom a logger, return the name of the log file

Parameters

did –

Returns

logger, logname

Return type

zutil.get_parser()¶
zutil.get_variable_name(var_org)¶

The var name of variable passed in (only work if unique value)

Parameters

var_org – the variable to get name from

Returns

the var name of parameter

Return type

zutil.head_dict(logger, d, head_n)¶

Preview n items of a dict

Parameters

  • logger – if no None then print stdout

  • d – the dict to view

  • head_n – how many key-value pairs to view

Returns

Return type

None

  • bins –

  • fig_name – elogs/{fig_name}.pdf
